verses.verse: Now Korah <WH7141>, the son <WH1121> of Izhar <WH3324>, the son <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955>, the son <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878>, with Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram <WH48>, the sons <WH1121> of Eliab <WH446>, and On <WH203>, the son <WH1121> of Peleth <WH6431>, sons <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205>, took men <WH3947>:

and they rose up <WH6965> before <WH6440> Moses <WH4872>, with certain <WH582> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> princes <WH5387> of the congregation <WH4150>, called <WH7148> to the assembly <WH5712>, men <WH582> of renown <WH8034>;

and they assembled themselves together <WH6950> against Moses <WH4872> and against Aaron <WH175>, and said <WH559> unto them <WH7227>, Ye take too much upon you <WH5712>, seeing all the congregation are holy <WH6918>, every one of them <WH3068>, and Jehovah is among <WH8432> them <WH5375>: wherefore then lift ye up yourselves above the assembly <WH6951> of Jehovah <WH3068>?
And when Moses <WH4872> heard <WH8085> it <WH5307>, he fell upon his face <WH6440>:

and he spake <WH1696> unto Korah <WH7141> and unto all his company <WH5712>, saying <WH559>, In the morning <WH1242> Jehovah <WH3068> will show <WH3045> who are his <WH6918>, and who is holy, and will cause him to come near <WH7126> unto him <WH977>: even him whom he shall choose will he cause to come near unto him <WH7126>.
This do <WH6213>: take <WH3947> you censers <WH4289>, Korah <WH7141>, and all his company <WH5712>;

and put <WH5414> fire <WH784> in them <WH2004>, and put <WH7760> incense <WH7004> upon them before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> to-morrow <WH4279>: and it shall be that the man <WH376> whom Jehovah <WH3068> doth choose <WH977>, he shall be holy <WH6918>: ye take too much <WH7227> upon you <WH1121>, ye sons of Levi <WH3878>.
And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto Korah <WH7141>, Hear <WH8085> now <WH1121>, ye sons of Levi <WH3878>:

seemeth it but a small thing <WH4592> unto you <WH430>, that the God of Israel <WH3478> hath separated <WH914> you from the congregation <WH5712> of Israel <WH3478>, to bring you near <WH7126> to himself <WH5647>, to do the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH4908> of Jehovah <WH3068>, and to stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> the congregation <WH5712> to minister unto them <WH8334>;
and that he hath brought thee near <WH7126>, and all thy brethren <WH251> the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> with thee <WH1245>? and seek ye the priesthood also <WH3550>?
Therefore <WH3651> thou and all thy company <WH5712> are gathered together <WH3259> against Jehovah <WH3068>: and Aaron <WH175>, what is he that ye murmur against him <WH3885>?
And Moses <WH4872> sent <WH7971> to call <WH7121> Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram <WH48>, the sons <WH1121> of Eliab <WH446>; and they said <WH559>, We will not come up <WH5927>:

is it a small thing <WH4592> that <WH3588> thou hast brought us up <WH5927> out of a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>, to kill <WH4191> us in the wilderness <WH4057>, but thou must needs make <WH8323> thyself also <WH8323> a prince over us <WH8323>?

Moreover <WH637> thou hast not brought <WH935> us into a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>, nor given <WH5414> us inheritance <WH5159> of fields <WH7704> and vineyards <WH3754>: wilt thou put out <WH5365> the eyes <WH5869> of these men <WH582>? we will not come up <WH5927>.

And Moses <WH4872> was very <WH3966> wroth <WH2734>, and said <WH559> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, Respect <WH6437> not thou their offering <WH4503>: I have not taken <WH5375> one <WH259> ass <WH2543> from them <WH7489>, neither have I hurt one of them <WH259>.
And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto Korah <WH7141>, Be thou and all thy company <WH5712> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>, thou <WH175>, and they, and Aaron, to-morrow <WH4279>:

and take <WH3947> ye every man <WH376> his censer <WH4289>, and put <WH5414> incense <WH7004> upon them <WH7126>, and bring ye before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> every man <WH376> his censer <WH4289>, two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> censers <WH4289>; thou also <WH175>, and Aaron, each <WH376> his censer <WH4289>.

And they took <WH3947> every man <WH376> his censer <WH4289>, and put <WH5414> fire <WH784> in them <WH7760>, and laid incense <WH7004> thereon <WH5975>, and stood at the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150> with Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175>.

And Korah <WH7141> assembled <WH6950> all the congregation <WH5712> against them unto the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>: and the glory <WH3519> of Jehovah <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> unto all the congregation <WH5712>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872> and unto Aaron <WH175>, saying <WH559>,
Separate <WH914> yourselves from among <WH8432> this congregation <WH5712>, that I may consume <WH3615> them in a moment <WH7281>.

And they fell <WH5307> upon their faces <WH6440>, and said <WH559>, O God <WH410>, the God <WH430> of the spirits <WH7307> of all flesh <WH1320>, shall one <WH259> man <WH376> sin <WH2398>, and wilt thou be wroth <WH7107> with all the congregation <WH5712>?
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,
Speak <WH1696> unto the congregation <WH5712>, saying <WH559>, Get you up <WH5927> from about <WH5439> the tabernacle <WH4908> of Korah <WH7141>, Dathan <WH1885>, and Abiram <WH48>.
And Moses rose up <WH6965> and went <WH3212> unto Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram <WH48>; and the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> followed <WH3212> him <WH310>.

And he spake <WH1696> unto the congregation <WH5712>, saying <WH559>, Depart <WH5493>, I pray you <WH168>, from the tents of these wicked <WH7563> men <WH582>, and touch <WH5060> nothing of theirs <WH5595>, lest ye be consumed in all their sins <WH2403>.

So they gat them up <WH5927> from the tabernacle <WH4908> of Korah <WH7141>, Dathan <WH1885>, and Abiram <WH48>, on every side <WH5439>: and Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram <WH48> came out <WH3318>, and stood <WH5324> at the door <WH6607> of their tents <WH168>, and their wives <WH802>, and their sons <WH1121>, and their little ones <WH2945>.
And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559>, Hereby ye shall know <WH3045> that Jehovah <WH3068> hath sent <WH7971> me to do <WH6213> all these works <WH4639>; for I have not done them of mine own mind <WH3820>.

If these men die <WH4191> the common death <WH4194> of all men <WH120>, or if they be visited <WH6485> after the visitation <WH6486> of all men <WH120>; then Jehovah <WH3068> hath not sent me <WH7971>.

But if Jehovah <WH3068> make <WH1254> a new thing <WH1278>, and the ground <WH127> open <WH6475> its mouth <WH6310>, and swallow them up <WH1104>, with all that appertain unto them <WH3381>, and they go down alive <WH2416> into Sheol <WH7585>; then ye shall understand <WH3045> that these men <WH582> have despised <WH5006> Jehovah <WH3068>.
And it came to pass <WH3615>, as he made an end of speaking <WH1696> all these words <WH1697>, that the ground <WH127> clave asunder that was under them <WH1234>;

and the earth <WH776> opened <WH6605> its mouth <WH6310>, and swallowed them up <WH1104>, and their households <WH1004>, and all the men <WH120> that appertained unto Korah <WH7141>, and all their goods <WH7399>.

So they <WH3381>, and all that appertained to them, went down alive <WH2416> into Sheol <WH7585>: and the earth <WH776> closed <WH3680> upon them <WH6>, and they perished from among <WH8432> the assembly <WH6951>.
And all Israel <WH3478> that were round about <WH5439> them fled <WH5127> at the cry <WH6963> of them <WH559>; for they said, Lest the earth <WH776> swallow us up <WH1104>.
And fire <WH784> came forth <WH3318> from Jehovah <WH3068>, and devoured <WH398> the two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> men <WH376> that offered <WH7126> the incense <WH7004>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH559> unto Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548>, that he take up <WH7311> the censers <WH4289> out <WH996> of the burning <WH8316>, and scatter <WH2219> thou the fire <WH784> yonder <WH1973>; for they are holy <WH6942>,

even the censers <WH4289> of these sinners <WH2400> against their own lives <WH5315>; and let them be made <WH6213> beaten <WH7555> plates <WH6341> for a covering <WH6826> of the altar <WH4196>: for they offered <WH7126> them before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>; therefore they are holy <WH6942>; and they shall be a sign <WH226> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

And Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548> took <WH3947> the brazen <WH5178> censers <WH4289>, which they that were burnt <WH8313> had offered <WH7126>; and they beat <WH7554> them out for a covering <WH6826> of the altar <WH4196>,

to be a memorial <WH2146> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, to the end that <WH834> no stranger <WH376>, that is not of the seed <WH2233> of Aaron <WH175>, come near <WH7126> to burn <WH6999> incense <WH7004> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>; that he be not as Korah <WH7141>, and as his company <WH5712>: as Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto him by <WH3027> Moses <WH4872>.

But on the morrow <WH4283> all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> murmured <WH3885> against Moses <WH4872> and against Aaron <WH175>, saying <WH559>, Ye have killed <WH4191> the people <WH5971> of Jehovah <WH3068>.

And it came to pass <WH5712>, when the congregation was assembled <WH6950> against Moses <WH4872> and against Aaron <WH175>, that they looked <WH6437> toward the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>: and <WH6051>, behold, the cloud covered <WH3680> it <WH3519>, and the glory of Jehovah <WH3068> appeared <WH7200>.
And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> came <WH935> to the front <WH6440> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,
Get you up <WH7426> from among <WH8432> this congregation <WH5712>, that I may consume <WH3615> them in a moment <WH7281>. And they fell <WH5307> upon their faces <WH6440>.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto Aaron <WH175>, Take <WH3947> thy censer <WH4289>, and put <WH5414> fire <WH784> therein from off <WH6440> the altar <WH4196>, and lay <WH7760> incense <WH7004> thereon <WH3212>, and carry it quickly <WH4120> unto the congregation <WH5712>, and make atonement <WH3722> for them <WH7110>: for there is wrath gone out <WH3318> from Jehovah <WH3068>; the plague <WH5063> is begun <WH2490>.

And Aaron <WH175> took <WH3947> as Moses <WH4872> spake <WH1696>, and ran <WH7323> into the midst <WH8432> of the assembly <WH6951>; and <WH5063>, behold, the plague was begun <WH2490> among the people <WH5971>: and he put <WH5414> on the incense <WH7004>, and made atonement <WH3722> for the people <WH5971>.
And he stood <WH5975> between the dead <WH4191> and the living <WH2416>; and the plague <WH4046> was stayed <WH6113>.

Now they that died <WH4191> by the plague <WH4046> were fourteen <WH702> thousand <WH505> and seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967>, besides them that died <WH4191> about the matter <WH1697> of Korah <WH7141>.
And Aaron <WH175> returned <WH7725> unto Moses <WH4872> unto the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>: and the plague <WH4046> was stayed <WH6113>.
